构造方法详细信息

Validation

public Validation()
方法详细信息

ageValidate

public boolean ageValidate(java.lang.String age)
Validation for car age. The age should be a positive number and less then 130.

返回：
car age validation result

carMakeValidate

public boolean carMakeValidate(java.lang.String carMake)
Validation for car make. The car make should be consisted of english characters and numbers.

返回：
car make validation result

carRegValidate

public boolean carRegValidate(java.lang.String carReg)
Validation for car registration number. The registration number should be consisted of english characters and numbers. The length of registration number should between 1 and 6.

返回：
car registration number validation result

colourValidate

public boolean colourValidate(java.lang.String colour)
Validation for car colour. The colour should be consisted of english characters.

返回：
car colour validation result

editOptionValidate

public boolean editOptionValidate(java.lang.String option)
Validation for edit option number. The edit option number should be 1 or 2.

返回：
car edit option number

otherColourValidate

public boolean otherColourValidate(java.lang.String colour)
Validation for the second or third colour. The requiremrnt of the second or third colour are same with the first colour. In addition, the second or third colour can be blank.

返回：
car second or third colour validation result

pricesValidate

public boolean pricesValidate(java.lang.String minPrice,
                              java.lang.String maxPrice)
Validation for minimum price and maximum price. The maximum price must greater than minimum price.

返回：
minimum price and maximum price validation result

priceValidate

public boolean priceValidate(java.lang.String price)
Validation for car price. The price should be a positive number, greater than $100 and less then $1,000,000,000.

返回：
car price validation result

yearMadeValidate

public boolean yearMadeValidate(java.lang.String yearMade)
Validation for car made uear number. The made year is reasonable from 1887 to the current year.

返回：
a string represent the made year number
